qas.question: What year did the Union Castle shipping line slowly start to reduce their service calls to the island?
Which shipping company replaced Union-Castle Line mailship service?
What year was Union-Castle Line mailship replaced?

context: From <a0_0>1958<a0_0/>, the Union Castle shipping line gradually reduced its service calls to the island. <a1_0>Curnow Shipping<a1_0/>, based in Avonmouth, replaced the Union-Castle Line mailship service in <a2_0>1977<a2_0/>, using the RMS (Royal Mail Ship) St Helena.
